title: Safe Your Bitcoin
author: Safe Your Bitcoin
content: The much-anticipated Bitcoin Amsterdam conference, Europe's largest Bitcoin event, is kicking off today, bringing together top speakers from around the world. https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/10/12/RNayZ.jpegThe event promises to be a hub for thought-provoking discussions, insights, and announcements within the Bitcoin technology sector, and comes at a time when the world's attention is focused on the FTX trial and the potential criminal conviction of its founder Sam Bankman-Fried.read

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Safe Your Bitcoin on October 12, 2023, 04:36:06 PMThe much-anticipated Bitcoin Amsterdam conference, Europe's largest Bitcoin event, is kicking off today, bringing together top speakers from around the world. The event promises to be a hub for thought-provoking discussions, insights, and announcements within the Bitcoin technology sector, and comes at a time when the world's attention is focused on the FTX trial and the potential criminal conviction of its founder Sam Bankman-Fried.readI am not expecting anything new about the conference besides some centralised platform owners coming together to market their products. Some of them will also spread lies and promote some shitcoins. But it will not be a bad idea to listen to Edward Snowden as he speaks on privacy and decentralization. Listening to Stella Assange the wife of WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange might be interesting. Maybe they might have something new to add to the community since these two key speakers support privacy and decentralisation.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Fiatless on October 12, 2023, 04:57:23 PMI am not expecting anything new about the conference besides some centralised platform owners coming together to market their products. Some of them will also spread lies and promote some shitcoins. But it will not be a bad idea to listen to Edward Snowden as he speaks on privacy and decentralization. Listening to Stella Assange the wife of WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange might be interesting. Maybe they might have something new to add to the community since these two key speakers support privacy and decentralisation.I did not expect that the wife of Julian Assange would be interested in cryptocurrency or BTC technology. Well, I tried to find out but as a result, I found out that Julian Assange was also a user and enthusiast of BTC ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MaB3Zw5_p9c ) and this video is also 9 years old. Well, if his wife is a crypto enthusiast then the interviews would be very interesting. I will look into it. Thanks for bringing this information in front of me. Besides that, Such events are really healthy for the crypto market, even though investors or big minds might try to come up with centralized or shit projects but still, we can not come to conclusions instantly and cannot judge books by their covers. So, we should slow down and enjoy such events. Although I can not go there hehe. still enjoy at YT. I actually came to know about Julian Assange recently when I was making my last topic about him and what he did was awesome but unfortunately, he was captured for that, but BTC is doing the work now.
